headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Take-Two’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Take-Two’s third quarter results were met with a negative market reaction, despite surpassing Wall Street’s revenue expectations. Management attributed the quarter’s top-line growth to strong performance across its mobile portfolio—particularly titles like Toon Blast and Color Block Jam—as well as the launch of NBA 2K26, which saw record in-game spending. CEO Strauss Zelnick highlighted that the company’s focus on engaging players and optimizing live services drove a 20% increase in recurrent co
